list.title: Config
list.description: This is the configuration of the entire REST API.

list.title: TrackerDetails
list.description: This Object type contain all de dtails of a specified Tracker.

list.title: module.exports.LogRequest
list.description: Add a request to SQL logs..

list.title: module.exports.LogUserLogin
list.description: Add a user login to SQL logs..

list.title: module:API_Handler
list.description: This module contains all the handlers for all the REST API endpoints.

list.title: module:API_Handler.HandleGetStatusList
list.description: Handle a for all tracker's status of a user.

list.title: module:API_Handler.HandleGetTrackerPositionActual
list.description: Handle a request for the actual position of a tracker

list.title: module:API_Handler.HandleGetTrackerPositionHistory
list.description: Handle a request for history of position of a tracker

list.title: module:API_Handler.HandleGetTrackerSafezonePosition
list.description: Handle a request for the safezone of a tracker

list.title: module:API_Handler.HandleGetUserTrackers
list.description: Handle a request for a user trackers array.

list.title: module:API_Handler.HandleSetStatus
list.description: Handle a request to set the status of a tracker.

list.title: module:API_Handler.HandleStatusRequest
list.description: Handle a tracker status request from his ID.

list.title: module:API_Handler.HandleTrackerAddRequest
list.description: Handle a request to add a tracker to a user.

list.title: module:API_Handler.HandleUserAddRequest
list.description: Handle a add user request.

list.title: module:API_Handler.HandleUserInfoRequest
list.description: Handle a user informations request

list.title: module:Date
list.description: This module help for things who needs Date relative elements.

list.title: module:Date.GetDate
list.description: Get current date as DD/MM/YYYY

list.title: module:Date.GetTime
list.description: Get current time as HH/MM/SS

list.title: module:Date.GetTimestamp
list.description: Get current timestamp

list.title: module:Date.Wait
list.description: Wait for specified amount of time

list.title: module:Debug
list.description: This module countains debug functions.

list.title: module:Debug.Print
list.description: Print data to console with date and time formating.

list.title: module:Discord
list.description: This module handle the send of Discord webhooks has setup in the config.js

list.title: module:Encryption
list.description: This module handle the password encryption, to store securely all users passwords.

list.title: module:Encryption.EncryptPassword
list.description: Encrypt a password.

list.title: module:Encryption.randomStringAsBase64Url
list.description: This function is used to get token.

list.title: module:Error_Codes
list.description: This module store all the error code and all the error message.

list.title: module:Index
list.description: This is the main module, it contain all the API Enpoints.

list.title: module:Index~GET_Endpoint_HandleGetSafezone
list.description: This GET endpoint take the unique ID of the tracker : /position/safezone/:id/ and return lat lon and diameter of the Safezone.

list.title: module:Index~GET_Endpoint_HandleGetStatusList
list.description: This GET endpoint take the auth token of the user : /status_list/:token/ and return all trackers status of the user.

list.title: module:Index~GET_Endpoint_HandleGetTrackerPositionActual
list.description: This GET endpoint take the unique ID of the tracker : /position/now/:id and return a Position Object.

list.title: module:Index~GET_Endpoint_HandleGetTrackerPositionHistory
list.description: This GET endpoint take the unique ID of the tracker : /position/history/:id/ and return an Array of Position Object.

list.title: module:Index~GET_Endpoint_HandleGetUserTrackers
list.description: This GET endpoint take the auth token of the user : /iot_list/:token/.

list.title: module:Index~GET_Endpoint_HandleStatusRequest
list.description: This GET endpoint take the unique ID of the tracker : /status/:id_iot/.

list.title: module:Index~GET_Endpoint_HandleUserInfoRequest
list.description: This GET endpoint take a mail and a password : /user/:mail/:password.

list.title: module:Index~GET_Endpoint_ROOT
list.description: The root GET endpoint is used to redirect to the web interface.

list.title: module:Index~Lazy_GET_Endpoint_HandleGetSafezone
list.description: Lazy endpoint for our Web developper.

list.title: module:Index~Lazy_GET_Endpoint_HandleGetStatusList
list.description: Lazy endpoint for our Web developper.

list.title: module:Index~Lazy_GET_Endpoint_HandleGetTrackerPositionActual
list.description: Lazy endpoint for our Web developper.

list.title: module:Index~Lazy_GET_Endpoint_HandleGetTrackerPositionHistory
list.description: Lazy endpoint for our Web developper.

list.title: module:Index~Lazy_GET_Endpoint_HandleGetUserTrackers
list.description: Lazy endpoint for our Web developper.

list.title: module:Index~Lazy_GET_Endpoint_HandleStatusRequest
list.description: Lazy endpoint for our Web developper.

list.title: module:Index~Lazy_GET_Endpoint_HandleUserInfoRequest
list.description: Lazy endpoint for our Web developper.

list.title: module:Index~Lazy_POST_Endpoint_HandleTrackerAddRequest
list.description: Lazy endpoint for our Web developper.

list.title: module:Index~Lazy_POST_Endpoint_HandleUserAddRequest
list.description: Lazy endpoint for our Web developper.

list.title: module:Index~Lazy_PUT_Endpoint_HandleSetStatus
list.description: Lazy endpoint for our Web developper.

list.title: module:Index~POST_Endpoint_HandleTrackerAddRequest
list.description: This POST endpoint add a new tracker in the database.

list.title: module:Index~POST_Endpoint_HandleUserAddRequest
list.description: This POST endpoint add a new user to the database.

list.title: module:Index~PUT_Endpoint_HandleSetStatus
list.description: This PUT endpoint set the status of the tarcker in the DB.

list.title: module:Index~Server
list.description: Create the REST API Server, listen on port setup in config.Server_Port.

list.title: module:MQTT
list.description: This module handle the communication with all the trackers with the help of the MQTT protocol.

list.title: module:MQTT.AddTracker
list.description: Add a new tracker to the MQTT module without restarting it.

list.title: module:MQTT.PingTracker
list.description: Send a MQTT ping request to the tracker based on his unique ID.

list.title: module:MQTT.RequestTrackerPosition
list.description: Send a MQTT position request to the tracker based on his unique ID.

list.title: module:MQTT.RequestTrackerStatus
list.description: Send a MQTT status request to the tracker based on his unique ID.

list.title: module:MQTT.UpdateTrackerStatus
list.description: Update status of a tracker based on his id.

list.title: module:MQTT~GlobalTrackerList
list.description: Array of all TrackerDetails Objects.

list.title: module:MQTT~MQTT_Listener
list.description: This listener take the topic and the message of MQTT frames, and trigger the corresponding actions.

list.title: module:MySQL
list.description: This module handle the communication with the MariaDB Server, the configuration for the server connection can be edited in config.json.

list.title: module:MySQL.AddPositionOfTrackerToDb
list.description: Add a position of a tracker to the DB from his id.

list.title: module:MySQL.AddRequestLog
list.description: Add request log.

list.title: module:MySQL.AddTrackerToUser
list.description: Add a new tracker to the DB and link it to an existing user.

list.title: module:MySQL.AddUserLogin
list.description: Add user log.

list.title: module:MySQL.AddUserToDb
list.description: Add a new user to the DB with provided informations.

list.title: module:MySQL.CheckUserCredentials
list.description: Fetch all data of a user from his mail.

list.title: module:MySQL.GetAllTrackersTopics
list.description: Fetch all credentials off all the existing trackers from the DB.

list.title: module:MySQL.GetTrackerHistoryPosition
list.description: Fetch the position history of a tracker based on his unique id (history).

list.title: module:MySQL.GetTrackerLastPosition
list.description: Fetch the last position of a tracker based on his unique ID (now).

list.title: module:MySQL.GetTrackerSafezone
list.description: Get the safezone of a tracker from his id.

list.title: module:MySQL.GetTrackerStatus
list.description: Fetch a tracker status from the DB from his unique MQTT topic (status).

list.title: module:MySQL.GetTrackersStatusList
list.description: Fetch all trackers status of a user from his token and put it in an array (status_list).

list.title: module:MySQL.GetUserInformation
list.description: Fetch the user information from the user auth token (id).

list.title: module:MySQL.GetUserTrackers
list.description: Fetch all trackers of a user from his id and put it in an array (iotArray).

list.title: module:MySQL.SetTrackerAvailability
list.description: Set the tracker availabilty.

list.title: module:MySQL.SetTrackerSafezone
list.description: Set the safezone of a tracker from his id.

list.title: module:MySQL.SetTrackerStatus
list.description: Set the tracker status in the DB with his unique ID.

list.title: module:MySQL.UpdateTrackerStatus
list.description: Update the tracker status in the DB.
